author: lgo
msg: * test/serf_response.c: Set svn:eol-style property to native (Issue #42).

author: lgo
msg: * CHANGES: List snapshot API in changes for next release.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix socket address family issue when opening a connection to a proxy.
(open_connections): Set/use serv_addr before calling socket create to ensure
that we use the right socket family to connect to our proxy.

author: lgo
msg: Change future version to 0.3, as the first new features have been added to trunk
* serf.h: Change version definitions from 0.2.1 to 0.3.

author: lgo
msg: Add a feature to take snapshots of buckets. It allows the user to take a bucket,
mark a snapshot, read the bucket and then later restore it to its snapshot shate,
so that the bucket can be read again.
Current implementation is only for simple and aggregate buckets, bit should be
expanded to all other types of buckets.
This is part of the change needed to fix Subversion issue #3212:
(struct serf_bucket_type_t): add new member functions to implement the snapshot
test_aggregate_read_restore_snapshot): Two new tests for the snapshot feature.
